content.raw: Oh great time saving. The PR changes the script to install always the latest linuxbrew version which could lead to some stability problems depending on: disruptive changes upstream or bugs released in latest versions. We can try and see how many problem we find along the way.
content.html: Oh great time saving. The PR changes the script to install always the latest linuxbrew version which could lead to some stability problems depending on: disruptive changes upstream or bugs released in latest versions. We can try and see how many problem we find along the way.
